definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: That of a baby, weeping, whimpering, frosty dews align down on his cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿般的，嘤嘤地，两行寒露在脸颊上流淌。

sentences.english: That of a baby, weeping, whimpering, frosty dews align down on his cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿般的，嘤嘤地，两行寒露在脸颊上流淌。

sentences.english: Gee, Boingo, I'm really sorry. Are you still running the cable car?
sentences.chinese: 呀，啵嘤，我真的很难过你还在开缆车吗。

sentences.english: And good old Rafa seems to be teetering on the brink over at Anfield.
sentences.chinese: 好老头贝尼特斯也在安菲尔德嘤嘤哭泣。

sentences.english: And good old Rafa seems to be teetering on the brink over at Anfield.
sentences.chinese: 好老头贝尼特斯也在安菲尔德嘤嘤哭泣。

sentences.english: Traffic cars, cell phone calls, top video screams at me.
sentences.chinese: 车水马龙，电话嘤嗡，高端影视等伴我周围。

sentences.english: When a traveler from the future must talk, he does not talk but whimpers .
sentences.chinese: 当来自未来的旅人必须开口时，他哀哀嘤嘤而不讲话。

sentences.english: When a traveler from the future must talk, he does not talk but whimpers .
sentences.chinese: 当来自未来的旅人必须开口时，他哀哀嘤嘤而不讲话。

sentences.english: Imagine yourself in that bee-loud glade.
sentences.chinese: 想象自己置身于那样一个蜜蜂嘤嘤的空地。

sentences.english: Imagine yourself in that bee-loud glade.
sentences.chinese: 想象自己置身于那样一个蜜蜂嘤嘤的空地。

definition: phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
(slang) alternative for 哎呦[ai1 you1] "oh my!"
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
aw, fuck! (loanword from Korean 아! 씨발!)
